name: Manager for international procurement (Focus Turkey, EU)
description:
Responsibility:
  • Research for suppliers and in Turkey and European Union
  • Evaluation of suppliers and their price offers
  • Order placements towards suppliers
  • Coordination of import/export shipment process as well as shipping documents filing with our logistics department
  • Invoice handling with internal accounting departmen
Requirements:
  • 3+ years professional experience in international procurement process
  • General understanding of international logistics processes preferable
  • PC skills: Experienced user of Microsoft Word and Excel
  • Language skills: Turkish (native), English (upper intermediate or higher), other European language skills are highly welcome but not a must
Conditions:

- You will work with an enthusiastic and friendly team
